Select

results = await Pokemon.select('name').where(Pokemon.power > 100).run()

Join

results = await Pokemon.select('trainer.name', 'name').run()

Delete

await Pokemon.delete().where(Pokemon.color == 'red' & Trainer.name == 'Bob').run()

Update

await Pokemon.delete().where(Pokemon.color == 'red' & Trainer.name == 'Bob').run()
